description: The ``opc_compute_ip_address_reservation`` resource creates and manages an IP address reservation in an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Compute Classic identity domain, for an IP Network.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: A description of the ip address reservation.

IpAddress.description: Reserved NAT IPv4 address from the IP address pool.

IpAddressPool.description: The IP address pool from which you want to reserve an IP address. Typically one of either `public-ippool` or `cloud-ippool`.

Name.description: The name of the ip address reservation.

Tags.description: List of tags that may be applied to the IP address reservation.

Uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier of the ip address reservation.
